english.segment1: My will won't break, it barely bends. Same old sinner, the same old sin. On my knees to plead again. Confessions trial, where to begin?
english.segment2: Have mercy, on me a sinning man. Lord have mercy, on me a sinning man
english.segment3: If it's true that the wages of sin is death. Then I've earned quite enough to quit. The reward I deserve I'd surely get. Were it not for you to pay my debt
english.segment4: Oh, I don't think I can take this further. Oh, if it's not one thing it's another.
